edu.harvard.lroc.eclipseplan
Class Phantom

java.lang.Object
  edu.harvard.lroc.eclipseplan.Phantom

public class Phantom
extends java.lang.Object

This encapsulates the set of CT ctImages, and converts them to EGS egsphant format if desired. For now, only deal with regular voxelization in each dimension.

Version:
$Revision: 255 $
Author:
David Chin

resample

public void resample(javax.vecmath.Point2d newPixelSize)
Resample the phantom to have pixels of newPixelSize. Cannot resample in the z-axis because we don't want to interpolate between CT slices.

Parameters:
newPixelSize - desired new pixel size
